abstract: Election of civic activist and independent candidate Park Won-soon as mayor of Seoul, South Korea, is widely regarded as a rebuke to Pres Lee Myung-bak, who Park has criticized vocally; election was widely seen as a bellwether for the presidential election in 2012.
snippet: Park Won-soon, an independent candidate backed by the main opposition party, was elected mayor of the South Korean capital, Seoul, in a blow to President Lee Myung-bak.
lead_paragraph: Park Won-soon, an independent candidate backed by the main opposition party, was elected mayor of the South Korean capital, Seoul, in a blow to President Lee Myung-bak.

headline.main: Critic of South Korean Leader Elected as Seoul Mayor
headline.print_headline: Seoul’s Selection for Mayor May Signal Broader Change
headline.seo: Critic of South Korean Leader Elected as Seoul Mayor
